name: Tree-chan to the Rescue!
description:
Tree-chan wants to live at the flowerbed at the end of the forest! Bring it there, would you?

But there are zombies which don't like Tree-chan: Defend it before they destroy it!

Also, Tree-chan gets... Wilty if it doesn't get the good soil from the flowerbed, which means you need to water it. Use either a watering can, a bucket or a barrel to water Tree-chan to make it grow nice and strong, it even rewards you with better weapons to defend it!

Will you be able to make Tree-chan's biggest wish come true?

WASD - Controls

E - Pick up Tree-chan (It's heavy! Takes a bit to pick it up and put down again)

Right Mouse Button - Water Tree-chan (needs to be refilled next to a river, go up next to it and press Right Mouse Button again)

Left Mouse Button - Attack - Pick up dropped apples when Tree-chan grows up to get better weapons!

Made during the 2022 HHN Game Jam with the theme "Keep It Alive."

Credits

Amelia Hantke - Models & Level Design

Lara Weller - Character Models & Weapon Models
